hero.title: Transparent and Scalable Pricing
hero.subtitle: Start for free and only pay for what you use. Our model is designed to adapt to your growth.

platform.title: Platform Pricing
platform.issuance_desc: Issuing virtual cards is free. If you choose to apply annual fees to your end-users, we collect a commission of $15 per card, per year.
platform.transaction_desc: Transactions on our network are free. If you apply transaction fees to your merchants, we take a 0.5% commission on the processed volume.
platform.bin_desc: Using a shared BIN is free. A dedicated BIN, for enhanced branding, is available for $230 per month, plus $15 per 1000 successful transactions.
platform.fraud_desc: Our standard anti-fraud verification, including behavioral and velocity analysis, is included at no extra cost.

services.title: Additional Services
services.kyc_desc: Identity verification (KYC), including government ID validation, selfie, and phone/email verifications, is billed at $2.51 per complete verification.
services.physical_cards_desc: Physical card issuance is available starting at $4 per plastic card and $6 per metal card, with bundling options for volume discounts.
services.sms_desc: SMS verifications (Inglis 1-way) are billed at $0.0093 per message sent.

calculator.title: Estimate Your Costs
calculator.subtitle: Use our simulator to get an estimate of your monthly fees.
